div.h1: Give today and support YES Prepâ€™s COVID-19 response efforts

span.style: font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px;
font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px;

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

span.style: font-size: 8.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Gotham Book'; color: #333e48; background: white;
span.span: The implications for school systems like YES Prep are mind boggling as the coronavirus continues to wreak havoc on life as we know it. But drawing on our deep commitment to our mission, the people who make up our school community have pulled together in extraordinary ways to support our students and families as we navigate these uncertain times together.Â

span.style: font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px;
font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px;
font-size: 8.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Gotham Book'; color: #333e48; background: white;
font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px;
font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px;
font-size: 8.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Gotham Book'; color: #333e48; background: white;

span.span: YES Prep is responding to the upheaval caused by the spread of COVID-19 by:Â

span.style: font-size: 8.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Gotham Book'; color: #333e48; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial;

span.span: Ensuring the health and well-being of our entire school community remains our #1 priority.

span.style: font-size: 8.5pt; line-height: 12.1267px; font-family: 'Gotham Book'; color: #333e48; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial;

font-size: 8.5pt; line-height: 12.1267px; font-family: 'Gotham Book'; color: #333e48; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial;

span.span:
Going above and beyond to prepare for remote learning.Â
â€¢Helping families meet their basic needs.

span.style: font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px;
font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px;
font-size: 8.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Gotham Book'; color: #333e48; background: white;

span.span: All of this is placing extra pressure on YES Prep's financial resources and our communities, but not once have we pulled back. With your gift toÂ

span.style: font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px;
font-size: 8.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Gotham Book'; color: #333e48; background: white;
font-size: 8.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Gotham Book'; color: #333e48; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial;

font-size: 8.5pt; line-height: 12.1267px; font-family: 'Gotham Book'; color: #333e48; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial;

font-size: 8.5pt; line-height: 12.1267px; font-family: 'Gotham Book'; color: #333e48; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial;

span.span: Keep YES Prep Learning, you make it possible to meet the critical and basic needs of our students, alumni, and families. Your generosity helps ensure that our students and alumni remain on track to graduate from college prepared to lead.Â

span.style: font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px;
font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px;
font-size: 8.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Gotham Book'; color: #333e48; background: white;
span.span:
You may also mail your gift to YES Prep Public Schools, 5515 South Loop East, Suite B, Houston, TX 77033.
If you have any questions or need assistance, please email advancement@yesprep.orgÂ or call (713) 967-9035.
